name: Obento Health
headline: CRM Co-Pilot for Medtech Sales
description: Obento Health is redefining the CRM experience for medical field sales. Designed specifically for healthcare, we are saving reps time from documentation and empowering reps to create more personalized interactions with their customers.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:medical-devices; industry:healthcare; industry:crm; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Naxin Wang, Founder
founders.description: I stumbled into healthcare and haven’t looked back since. Currently building CRM for Medical Sales at Obento Health. Analyst by training at Google and built products at Verily Life Sciences, serving biopharma and medtech customers.

[ Sign Up ](https://www.getobento.com/<#join>)
# CRM copilot for medtech sales
Logging your visits on-the-go and tracking all your customer relationships shouldn’t be so draining. Obento Health is supercharging the CRM experience for medical field sales. 
Join early access 
Sign Up
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Backed-by-YC.svg)
[ ![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Apple-Badge-White.svg) ](https://www.getobento.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/obento-health/id6670142261>)
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/hero-card-ellipse.png)
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/hero-card-record.png)
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/hero-card-contact.png)
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/hero-card-activity.png)
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/hero-card-assistant.png)
Our team has decades of experience building products used by millions.
![Verily](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/verily-life-sciences-seeklogo-1.svg)
![Google](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Google.svg)
![Abbott](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Abbott_Laboratories_logo-1.svg)
![Medtronic](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Wordmark.svg)
![Strava](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/strava-1.svg)
### Obento is the easiest way to manage your book of business
####  Designed for Road Warriors 
You are constantly on the go. No more fussing with the laptop and wifi. All you need is on your phone. 
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/car-01-1.svg)
####  Made Just for Healthcare 
Obento leverages healthcare domain-specific data and expertise to enhance the generic CRM. 
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/hospital-02-1.svg)
####  Built for Reps, by Reps 
CRM should be helpful, not taxing. Obento helps you minimize the time you spend on reporting. 
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/magic-wand-01-1.svg)
VOICE-TO-CRM
### Windshield time can be productive
Our voice-to-CRM feature makes it so easy to log your visits. No more late night working on your notes.
REMINDERS
### Never miss a follow-up
Obento automatically creates follow-ups from your notes and sends you reminders at the right time.
CONTACT MANAGEMENT
### Remember everyone that matters
We are bringing your rolodex back, right at your fingertips when you need it.
OBENTO ASSISTANT
### Uncover overlooked insights
Part assistant, part coach. Debrief mode helps you reflect on your visit and extract insights to prepare you for your next interaction.
![](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Animation-Story-4-Poster-1-1024x768.png)
### Seamless integration with your CRM
Obento integrates with your CRM and productivity suites. We can make your job easier on day one.
Dev Test
![Integrations HubSpot](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Integrations-HubSpot-1.webp)
![Integrations Salesforce](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Integrations-Salesforce-2.webp)
![Integrations Google Sheet](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Integrations-GoogleSheet-1.webp)
![Integrations MicrosotExcel](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Integrations-MicrosotExcel-1.webp)
![Integrations Google Calendar](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Integrations-GoogleCalendar-1.webp)
![Integrations Outlook](https://www.getobento.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Integrations-Outlook-1.png)
### Frequently asked questions
What is Obento? 
Obento is a mobile app that can turn your voice notes into structured CRM data. We don't just transcribe your voice note, Obento automatically creates follow-ups and new contacts for you. It's designed specifically for medical sales.
My company already has a CRM. Does Obento replace it? 
No, we are a companion to your CRM. You can use Obento to keep track of all your clinic visits and we integrate into your CRM.
What makes you better than my CRM’s mobile app? 
Unlike a generic CRM, we are designed specifically for medical sales reps in mind. We make it really easy for you to track your visits and contacts. 
Can I trial the app? 
Absolutely! Our beta is now opened to territory managers who want to save time from doing notes. Book a 10min demo with us to get a trial set up! No credit card required.
## Curious how AI can help you as a rep?
We are saving reps time from documentation and empowering reps to create more personalized interactions with their customers.

generated_description:
**Obento Health** is a fresh face in the medtech landscape, founded in 2023 and already making waves as part of Y Combinator's Batch S23. Based in San Francisco and comprising a nimble team of just two, Obento is on a mission to redefine the CRM (Customer Relationship Management) experience specifically for medical sales reps. Their mantra? "CRM Co-Pilot for Medtech Sales."

This isn't just any CRM tool; Obento is designed to save sales reps time on tedious documentation, allowing them to focus on what really matters: building meaningful relationships with customers. By streamlining the logging of visits and managing customer interactions, Obento empowers sales reps to engage more personally with healthcare professionals.

### What They Offer

Obento stands out due to its focus on mobile usability—ideal for those constantly on the move. With its voice-to-CRM feature, reps can easily log notes by simply talking instead of typing, which means no more late-night catch-up sessions on documentation. It even auto-generates follow-up reminders based on these notes, ensuring that key connections never slip through the cracks.

The app is embedded with healthcare-specific data, making it far more effective than generic CRM tools. Obento integrates seamlessly with existing CRMs and productivity suites like HubSpot, Salesforce, and various calendar applications, enhancing user efficiency from day one.

### Features and Functionality

- **Voice to CRM:** Log visits quickly with voice notes that translate into structured data.
- **Follow-Up Reminders:** Automatic follow-up creation from notes ensures no missed connections.
- **Contact Management:** A user-friendly interface to access crucial contacts on-the-go.
- **Obento Assistant:** A hybrid of assistant and coach, guiding reps to optimize their interactions.

### Getting Started

The company encourages potential users to book a demo and take advantage of their early access program. No credit card is needed upfront, making it easy for territory managers to explore how Obento can revolutionize their workflow.

With backing from Garry Tan and a vision that positions it as not just a tool but a partner in driving sales success, Obento Health is poised to be a game-changer in the medical sales arena. For more information or to join the ranks of savvy sales reps using this innovative app, check out their website at [Obento Health](https://www.getobento.com).
